title: 1995 Japanese Grand Prix
summary: The 1995 Japanese Grand Prix (formally the XXI Fuji Television Japanese Grand Prix) was a Formula One motor race held at the Suzuka Circuit, Suzuka on 29 October 1995. It was the sixteenth and penultimate race of the 1995 Formula One World Championship.[1] Michael Schumacher, driving a Benetton-Renault won the 53-lap race from pole position, with Mika HÃ¤kkinen second in a McLaren-Mercedes and Schumacher's teammate Johnny Herbert third.[2]
